General.Name: Saratoga Investama Sedaya
General.Description: PT Saratoga Investama Sedaya Tbk is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in early stage, growth stage and special situations investments. It primarily invests in natural resources, energy, infrastructure, telecommunication, shipping, pharmaceutical, retail, food and beverage, and consumer goods sectors. The firm seeks to make investments in Indonesia. It focuses on acquisitions that are six to eight times EBITDA. The firm seeks to hold its investments for a period of three to five years. Saratoga Capital Investment was founded in 1997 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia with an additional office in Singapore, Singapore.
